item.description:
Paved trails ... we'll go for about an hour. The trails go through the woods with lots of little hills, twists and turns. It's a short run but a decent workout.

I reccomend using a mountain bike or at least a hybrid.  Although paved, the trails are covered with pine needles, sticks and rooty bumps... is that what they are called? Anyway bring a mountain bike if you have one.

Here's my number in case you need it.... 508-479-7690

I might be a couple of minutes late so just wait and I'll be there.
item.how_to_find_us: Look For My Blue Toyota Sienna Van with the Bike Rack

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Bike Ride - Myles Standish State Forest.
